definition: string name for filter to use on the aggregate label ('currency', 'date', etc..) defaults to cellFilter if not set.
Sets the css class for the column cells.
string name for filter to use on the cell ('currency', 'date', etc..)
Sets the cell template for the column.
Sets the header name of the column.
Can also be a property path on your data model. 'foo.bar.myField', 'Name.First', etc..
Sets the template for the column header cell.
Sets the css class for the column header.
Sets the maximum width of the column.
Sets the minimum width of the column.
Whether or not column is resizable.
Whether or not column is sortable.
Sets the sort function for the column.
Sets the width of the column.
